name: The Light into the Darkness(DEMO)
description:
Short thriller first person demo where you are in look like nightmare, without knowing why, what are you going to do?

Yes!!!   I develop all this game with myself.

Controls

MOVEMENT                WASD

RUN                                   SHIFT

FLASH                              F

INSPECTION               E
